department.dept_long_name: Committee on the Study of Religion

course.title: Greek Exegesis of Mark
course.description: The course will be devoted to a close reading and interpretation of the Gospel of Mark. The Greek text will be discussed with specific attention paid to literary structures, textual critical issues, historical context, and history of interpretation.
course.prerequisites: Two semesters of Greek are required. The course might fulfill the requirement for a fourth semester of Greek.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 1527.
